property.value: When you strike with Steelhawk Crossbow, your hero has long-range this combat. At the start of your turn, exhaust Steelhawk Crossbow unless you pay 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Stormpike Insignia, destroy it. When Stormpike Insignia is destroyed this way, your hero deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally. Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn, pay 7 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ready target opposing ally. This turn, it's a protector and you control it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest. Reward: If you control a location, draw a card. If you control a quest, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may have target opponent reveal the top card of his deck. If you do, you may have him put that card on the bottom of his deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, each player chooses an ally in his party. Destroy all other allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undead Hero Required Exhaust --> You may remove target ally card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, an Undead in your party heals 2 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target a friendly hero and a friendly ally. The next time each of them would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero and heals 1 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector You pay 1 less to play Vanndar for each honor counter on cards you control. 1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control --> Each player destroys one of his resources.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Shaman, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has dual wield. You can strike with Vengeful Gladiator's Cleaver while an ally in your party is in combat. (If you do, that ally gains this card's ATK and damage type this combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When combat damage is dealt with one or more of your weapons, ready all of your weapons. --> Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Mage, Priest, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players pay 2 more to play cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector Exhaust --> Ready all abilities and equipment you control.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Mage, Priest, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wand of Prismatic Focus enters play, your hero deals 1 arcane, 1 fire, 1 frost, 1 nature, and 1 shadow damage to target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play a card, add an honor counter. Exhaust, Remove two honor counters --> Target ally is a protector this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment readies, put it into its owner's hand. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Mage, Priest, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an [Alliance] ally is dealt frost or [Frost] damage, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally or weapon. Ongoing: Attached card has +3 ATK. When attached card becomes exhausted for the first time each turn, you may ready it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each ally has ATK equal to its printed ATK, has health equal to its printed health, and can't gain or lose ATK or health.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Hutner, Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust --> Reveal the top two cards of your deck, then put them on the bottom. If they have different card types, your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Mage, Priest, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Destroy Wub's Cursed Hexblade --> Destroy target ally. If an opponent went first this game, put a card with the same name as that ally from a graveyard into your party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control --> Prevent the next 1 damage that Yula would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector When an opponent's hero readies, you may pay 1. If you do, destroy target ability or equipment that opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Flip Zi'mo --> Zi'mo has +2 ATK while damaged this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Flip Zophos --> Zophos deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target attacker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.) When Zumbly leaves play, target ally is a protector this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally. If that ally doesn't have fatal damage, put A Taste of Divinity into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control --> Remove Adam from the game. Put him into play at the start of the next turn.
